name: Expo
headline: Expo brings together the best of web and native app development
description:
Expo lets developers write apps that are written in JavaScript and run natively on Android, iOS, and the web. Our cloud services that work with all Expo and React Native apps, named Expo Application Services (EAS), further speeds up teams by helping them get to the app stores as fast as possible and continue growing.

We believe that mobile apps provide a better experience than websites, but making apps is much more difficult than it needs to be. With Expo, we're bringing together the best of the web, like its development speed, fast iteration cycles, easy deploys, and automatic cross-platform support, and the performance, device capabilities, and user experience of native apps.

founders.name: Charlie Cheever, Founder
founders.description: Grew up in Pittsburgh, went to Harvard, worked at Amazon, worked at Facebok, cofounded Quora, working on Expo (YCS16).

[Docs](https://expo.dev/<https:/docs.expo.dev>)[Tools](https://expo.dev/</tools>)[EAS](https://expo.dev/</eas>)[Pricing](https://expo.dev/</pricing>)[Careers](https://expo.dev/</careers>)[Star Us on GitHub](https://expo.dev/<https:/github.com/expo/expo>)[Sign Up](https://expo.dev/</signup>)[Log In](https://expo.dev/</login>)
[Learn what‚Äôs new!](https://expo.dev/</changelog>)
# Expo and EAS arean ecosystem of tools that help you  develop review& deploy
Create universal native apps with React that run on Android, iOS, and the web. Iterate with confidence.
[Sign Up for Free](https://expo.dev/</signup>)[Read the Docs](https://expo.dev/<https:/docs.expo.dev>)
Trusted by top companies
[Read Their Stories](https://expo.dev/</customers>)
![Bluesky logo](https://expo.dev/static/home/logos/bluesky-color.svg)![Brex logo](https://expo.dev/static/home/logos/brex-color.svg)![Cameo logo](https://expo.dev/static/home/logos/cameo-color.svg)![Codecademy logo](https://expo.dev/static/home/logos/codecademy-color.svg)![Pizza Hut logo](https://expo.dev/static/home/logos/pizza-hut-color.svg)
We are the home for developers building native apps across Android and iOS with JavaScript (neat, right?). We‚Äôre open source. Offer a free plan. And are pretty-much the go-to if you‚Äôre building a mobile app.
We‚Äôre a full ecosystem of tools that help you write, build, update, submit, and monitor mobile apps. App store submission a pain? We‚Äôve got you. Want developer tools in your app? Done. Our application services are built to help you ship faster. And if you get stuck, join our community of developers or say hello and meet our team.
Behind every movie is a production team. Behind every great chef, someone running the restaurant. We‚Äôll take care of the slow stuff so you and your team can focus on building the world‚Äôs best apps.
## Develop
### Get started
Initialize a new project or bring an existing React Native project.
![Expo CLI](https://expo.dev/static/home/cli-terminal.png)
### File-based routing, TypeScript ready
Create stack and modal screens with minimal boilerplate using your filesystem. Feel confident with TypeScript.
![File-based routing](https://expo.dev/static/home/editor-router.png)
### Get going, then keep going with fast refresh
Run your project on your own device with Expo Go. See your app update in milliseconds as you make changes.
![Expo workflow](https://expo.dev/static/home/hello-world-dark.png)![Expo workflow](https://expo.dev/static/home/hello-world.png)
### Use any library, SDK, or write your own native code
You‚Äôll never be limited by Expo. Write native code. Access every device API. Write anything, then run it everywhere.
![Maps API showcase](https://expo.dev/static/home/api-maps.webp)[Maps](https://expo.dev/<https:/docs.expo.dev/versions/latest/sdk/map-view/>)
![Camera API showcase](https://expo.dev/static/home/api-camera.webp)[Camera](https://expo.dev/<https:/docs.expo.dev/versions/latest/sdk/camera/>)
![Image API showcase](https://expo.dev/static/home/api-image.webp)[Image](https://expo.dev/<https:/docs.expo.dev/versions/latest/sdk/image/>)
![Navigation API showcase](https://expo.dev/static/home/api-navigation.webp)[Navigation](https://expo.dev/<https:/docs.expo.dev/routing/introduction/>)
## Review
### Invite your team
With adjustable roles, your whole team can contribute, test, and view the state of your deployments.
### Upgrade your PR reviews
Commit, push to GitHub, and generate a QR code. That‚Äôs all that‚Äôs needed to let your team review a feature before merging.
![Expo workflow](https://expo.dev/static/home/review-github-dark.png)![Expo workflow](https://expo.dev/static/home/review-github.png)
### Run end-to-end tests
Use Maestro to run automated end-to-end tests on EAS.
![Fast refresh](https://expo.dev/static/home/review-e2e.webp)
## Deploy
### Create and submit app store-ready builds
Kick off a build. Then we‚Äôll submit it to the App Store and Play Store automatically if you like.
![Expo Dashboard](https://expo.dev/static/home/deploy-builds-dark.png)![Expo Dashboard](https://expo.dev/static/home/deploy-builds.png)
### Publish bug fixes in minutes
Found a typo on your home screen? Don‚Äôt sweat: fix it, then publish an update that your users will receive the next time they launch your app. 
![GitHub bot](https://expo.dev/static/home/deploy-update.webp)
### Dashboards to keep your team on track
We keep track of all of your builds, submissions, and deployments, organized on web dashboards for your whole team.
![Expo Dashboard](https://expo.dev/static/home/deploy-dashboard-dark.webp)![Expo Dashboard](https://expo.dev/static/home/deploy-dashboard.webp)
### Iterate with confidence
With flexible deployment patterns and the ability to rollback in seconds, you can iterate faster than ever before.
## An open-source platform built for production apps
### 120 FPS
Animations
### 900K+
Projects
### 75+
Premade modules
### >50%
React Native projects using Expo
## Services made for professionals
### Build
Create builds for your team and for the app stores.
### Submit
Submit apps to the App Store and Google Play store.
### Update
Get the latest changes to your users in minutes, not days.
### Workflows
Automate your development and release processes.
### Hosting
Deploy and monitor your API routes and web apps.
### Metadata
Automate and maintain your app store metadata with ease.
### Insights
Learn how users use your app as you deploy.
### On-demand
Pay for the services you use, as you grow.
### Support
Get unstuck with help from the Expo team.
## And you‚Äôll get so much more‚Ä¶
### Organization accounts. Production-like development server. Developer tools built in. Automatic native code configuration. Use any native code. Simulator builds. File-based routing. Automatic build submissions. App store metadata verification. Usage-based pricing. Team credential management.
Preview updates with a QR code. Save app store metadata. Automatic app store credentials management. Ad-hoc builds. End-to-end code signing. Build logs. Member roles. Web dashboards. Submission logs. Top-notch universal modules. Expo Discord community. End-to-end testing.
Regular SDK releases. Apple silicon builders for iOS. Automatic version incrementing in CI. GitHub Actions-ready. Shareable Snack playgrounds. VS Code extension.
[Get Started](https://expo.dev/<https:/docs.expo.dev>)
## Try it for yourself
Fast animations. Genuine native components. Edit in your browser and preview on your device in seconds.
Runs natively on:
Android
iOS
Web
### Finance app
Track expenses. 60 FPS animations.
[Try It](https://expo.dev/<https:/snack.expo.dev/@expo-team-snacks/finance-app>)
![Finance app](https://expo.dev/static/home/app-finance.webp)
### Image app
Upload images. Add stickers. Save to device.
[Try It](https://expo.dev/<https:/snack.expo.dev/@expo-team-snacks/image-app>)
![Image app](https://expo.dev/static/home/app-image.webp)
[Build It Step-by-Step](https://expo.dev/<https:/docs.expo.dev/tutorial/create-your-first-app>)
### Social media app
Native navigation. Fast lists. Ready to scroll.
[Try It](https://expo.dev/<https:/snack.expo.dev/@expo-team-snacks/social-app>)
![Social media app](https://expo.dev/static/home/app-social.webp)
![Rafael Mendiola's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/GroundControl.webp)
Rafael Mendiola
@GroundControl
From the Q&A panel: "If I were starting a new React Native app I would use @expo". The whole group endorsed it #ReactNativeEU
![Lisa Miller's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/LisaMillerCool.webp)
Lisa Miller
@LisaMillerCool
If you are planning to develop an app using react native, it's a no-brainer to go with Expo. It's like a package of goodies. I don't even understand why it's so awesome. Good job @expo team. You've made our lives simpler.
![Wes Johnson's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/WesleyJohnson.webp)
Wes Johnson
@WesleyJohnson
As a career-long web developer, getting push notifications working in @reactnative via @expo feels like black magic. Loving it.
![ipey's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/irfan__zainudin.webp)
ipey
@irfan__zainudin
It is so easy to build your own mobile app nowadays. With technologies like @reactnative and @expo, literally anyone with an idea can rapidly build their dream app. What a time to be alive!
![Mat Warger's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/mwarger.webp)
Mat Warger
@mwarger
I don't know who needs to hear this but @expo is the future.
![William Candillon's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/wcandillon.webp)
William Candillon
@wcandillon
The speed at which React Native Web via @expo has evolved in the past 6 months is absolutely wild. My head is spinning.
![Trevor Hartman's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/devth.webp)
Trevor Hartman
@devth
Expo recently made it possible to target web, so you can write a single UI for native and web. I‚Äôm continually impressed. Otherwise next.js by @zeithq is incredible. Both of these projects have amazing docs, DX, and fast release cycles.
![Jamon Holmgren's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/jamonholmgren.webp)
Jamon Holmgren
@jamonholmgren
So @expo‚Äôs over the air update feature just saved us on launch day (yes, Friday, sorry). We had a crash happening on a critical path (didn‚Äôt happen in dev testing) but narrowed it down and deployed a fix using OTA in about an hour.
![Annie Elequin's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/AnnieElequin.webp)
Annie Elequin
@AnnieElequin
@expo made notifications so easy, I almost cried tears of joy üò≠ using expo is just a delightful experience
![Ryan Baldwin's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/bakerofbytes.webp)
Ryan Baldwin
@bakerofbytes
It‚Äôs difficult to make a tool that is powerful, easy to use, and stays out of the way. @expo has figured it out and it‚Äôs one of the most pleasurable dev experiences I‚Äôve had in my career.
![Casey Li's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/caseyli23.webp)
Casey Li
@caseyli23
I love how @expo allows me to build my standalone apps remotely on their much more powerful servers! Saves time and allows me to continue to use my computer while I wait for the build!
![The Big Red Geek's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/thebigredgeek.webp)
The Big Red Geek
@thebigredgeek
I think @expo is one of the most beautiful ****ing pieces of engineering I‚Äôve seen in a very long time
![Tyler H's avatar](https://expo.dev/static/home/avatars/Ipse_dixt_T.webp)
Tyler H
@Ipse_dixt_T
Arkansas Western District Court uses expo web. I chose @expo because it was the fastest way for a single developer to achieve our mandate‚Äîmobile/desktop/web.

generated_description:
### Expo: Bridging the Gap Between Web and Native App Development

**Overview**: Founded in 2016 as part of Y Combinator's S16 batch, Expo is a development platform that simplifies the creation of apps using JavaScript, allowing developers to deploy across Android, iOS, and the web seamlessly. Based in Palo Alto, California, Expo operates with a lean team of 23 employees under the guidance of group partner Michael Seibel.

**Mission**: Expo believes that mobile apps can offer a superior user experience compared to websites, yet creating them shouldn‚Äôt be a cumbersome process. Their mission is to combine the rapid development capabilities of the web with the performance and capabilities of native apps, making app creation more accessible.

**Key Offerings**:
1. **Expo Application Services (EAS)**: This cloud service is designed to accelerate the development process, helping teams get their apps to the app stores quickly and efficiently. 
2. **Unified Development Ecosystem**: Expo provides a comprehensive set of tools for developers to write, build, update, submit, and monitor applications, making app store submissions painless and incorporating developer tools without hassle.
3. **Open Source Framework**: Being open source, Expo invites innovation and collaboration within its community, empowering developers to leverage its resources freely.

**Development Features**:
- **Cross Platform**: Write code once and run it everywhere‚ÄîAndroid, iOS, and the web.
- **Rapid Iteration**: Features like fast refresh allow changes to be seen in real-time, improving the development cycle dramatically.
- **Customizability**: Developers can use any library or SDK and even write their own native code, ensuring flexibility.

**Deployment and Monitoring**:
- Expo handles the heavy lifting involved in building and submitting apps to the respective stores.
- Built-in dashboards provide insights into builds, deployments, and user interactions, simplifying team collaboration.

**Community and Support**: Expo fosters a vibrant developer community, where users can share experiences, troubleshoot together, and access a wealth of resources like documentation, tutorials, and dedicated support.

**Why Choose Expo?**:
- **Developer-Centric**: Expo's tools enhance productivity, making it simpler to deliver high-quality apps.
- **Proven Track Record**: It‚Äôs trusted by leading companies across various industries, showcasing reliability and industry standards.

For more information, visit their [website](https://expo.dev). Whether you're building a finance app, an image uploader, or a social media platform, Expo streamlines the entire process, making app development as enjoyable as coding should be.
